meaningMnemonic: You decide to <radical>loiter</radical> next to the <radical>trash</radical> under the <radical>moon</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> so the moon's light will <kanji>penetrate</kanji> you. The sky is <kanji>clear</kanji>est in winter, and this spot next to the trash happens to get the most of it.
readingMnemonic: You want the light to <kanji>penetrate</kanji> you, so you put your face in the way of the beam and it shoots <kanji>clear</kanji> through you. Your mouth fills with the taste of <reading>鉄</reading> (てつ).
